buffs.description: [Surprise Attack] can activate even if the Crimson Hawk Rider is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%, Max 60%).
buffs.name: Surprise Attack

hidden_abilites: Increases self movement speed by 9% and attack distance by 10%.
Increases movement speed and attack distance by 6% and critical damage by 5% for all units.
Attack power and critical damage probability increased greatly against enemy crystal.
Become invisible (cloaking), silently go into enemy base and destroy the base.

Even if the Crimson Hawk Rider is in the shop of time, the surprise attack is triggered with a 1% chance for 5-star unit and a 3% chance for 6-star unit. However, the probability of surprise attack can not exceed 60%
description.skill2: Reach limit break of Maximum Medal Buff from transcended Unit in Time Shop (0%, 0%, 300%, 400%, 500%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Crimson Hawk Rider ]
